bayes_network.builders

Class HillClimbingBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes_network.builders.NetworkBuilder
      • bayes_network.builders.HillClimbingBuilder

  • public class HillClimbingBuilder
extends NetworkBuilder
    Implements a standard hill climbing search through the Bayes Nets structures in order to optimize a scoring function. Upon each iteration of the search, this algorithm considers ALL possible operations on the network's structure:

    1. Add edge
    2. Remove edge
    3. Reverse edge

    The algorithm stops its search when some stopping criteria is met.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

      • undoOperation

        private void undoOperation(Operation operation)
        Undoes the specified operation. If the operation is to add an edge, this operation removes the edge. If the operation is to remove an edge, this method will add it. If the operation is to reverse an edge between two nodes, this method will reverse it the other way.
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation to undo

      • getAllValidOperations

        private java.util.ArrayList<Operation> getAllValidOperations()
        Determine all valid operations that can be performed on the network
        Returns:
        an exhaustive list of all valid operations that can be performed on the network
